isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - ELECTRONIC ENGINE, CUMMINS ISM - OPERATION - Brake Switch

svcproc.title: Brake Switch
svcproc.para: The brake switch (69) receives a ground signal on circuit 97-GF and 97H, through connectors (330) and (3) on circuit 97-GA from (1091). While the brake pedal is released, the switch is closed supplying a ground on circuit 97AL through connectors (330) and (3) to ECM connector (1091).
When the brake is applied the ground will be removed signaling the ECM that the brake has been applied.
